steps.name: CypherCommand
commands:
match (n:esco__Skill)
unwind n.skos__prefLabel as prefLabels
create (l:ncs__SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: prefLabels, uri: "<<ContentApiPrefix>>/SkillLabel/" + apoc.create.uuid()})
create (n)-[:ncs__hasPrefLabel]->(l)

match (n:esco__Skill)
unwind n.skos__altLabel as altLabels
create (l:ncs__SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: altLabels, uri: "<<ContentApiPrefix>>/SkillLabel/" + apoc.create.uuid()})
create (n)-[:ncs__hasAltLabel]->(l)

match (n:esco__Skill)
unwind n.skos__hiddenLabel as hiddenLabels
create (l:ncs__SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: hiddenLabels, uri: "<<ContentApiPrefix>>/SkillLabel/" + apoc.create.uuid()})
create (n)-[:ncs__hasHiddenLabel]->(l)
